verses.verse: After<WG3326> these things,<WG5023> Jesus<WG2424> revealed<WG5319> himself<WG1438> again<WG3825> to the disciples<WG3101> at<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> of Tiberias.<WG5085> <WG1161> He<WG5319> revealed himself this way.<WG3779>

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "I<WG5217>'m going fishing.<WG232>" They told<WG3004> him,<WG846> "We<WG2249> are also<WG2532> coming<WG2064> with<WG4862> you.<WG4671>" They immediately<WG2117> went out,<WG1831> and<WG2532> entered<WG305> into<WG1519> the boat.<WG4143> <WG2532> <WG1722> That<WG1565> night,<WG3571> they caught<WG4084> nothing.<WG3762>

But when<WG1161> day<WG4405> had already<WG2235> come,<WG1096> Jesus<WG2424> stood<WG2476> on<WG1519> the beach,<WG123> yet<WG3305> the disciples<WG3101> didn't<WG3756> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> Jesus.<WG2424>
Jesus<WG2424> therefore<WG3767> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Children,<WG3813> have you<WG2192> <WG3361> anything<WG5100> to eat?<WG4371>" They answered<WG611> him,<WG846> "No.<WG3756>"

He<WG1161> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Cast<WG906> the net<WG1350> on<WG1519> the right<WG1188> side<WG3313> of the boat,<WG4143> and<WG2532> you will find<WG2147> some.<WG906>" They cast it therefore,<WG3767> and<WG2532> now<WG2089> they weren't<WG2480> <WG3756> able<WG2480> to draw<WG1670> it<WG846> in for<WG575> the multitude<WG4128> of fish.<WG2486>

That<WG1565> disciple<WG3101> therefore<WG3767> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> loved<WG25> said<WG3004> to Peter,<WG4074> "It<WG2076>'s the Lord!<WG2962>" So when<WG3767> Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> heard<WG191> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> the Lord,<WG2962> he wrapped<WG1241> his coat<WG1903> around him<WG1063> (for he was<WG2258> naked<WG1131>), and<WG2532> threw<WG906> himself<WG1438> into<WG1519> the sea.<WG2281>

But<WG1161> the other<WG243> disciples<WG3101> came in<WG2064> the little boat<WG4142> (for<WG1063> they were<WG2258> not<WG3756> far<WG3112> from<WG575> the land,<WG1093> but<WG235> <WG5613> about<WG575> two hundred<WG1250> cubits<WG4083> away<WG4951>), dragging the net<WG1350> full of fish.<WG2486>
So<WG5613> when<WG3767> they got out<WG576> on<WG1519> the land,<WG1093> they saw<WG991> a fire of coals<WG439> there,<WG2749> and<WG2532> fish<WG3795> laid on<WG1945> it,<WG2532> and bread.<WG740>
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Bring<WG5342> some of<WG575> the fish<WG3795> which<WG3739> you have<WG4084> just<WG3568> caught.<WG4084>"

Simon<WG4613> Peter<WG4074> went up,<WG305> and<WG2532> drew<WG1670> the net<WG1350> to<WG1909> land,<WG1093> full<WG3324> of great<WG3173> fish,<WG2486> one hundred<WG1540> fifty-three;<WG4004> and<WG2532> even though there were<WG5607> so many,<WG5118> the net<WG1350> wasn't<WG4977> <WG3756> torn.<WG4977>

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "Come<WG1205> and eat breakfast.<WG709>" <WG1161> None<WG3762> of the disciples<WG3101> dared<WG5111> inquire<WG1833> of him,<WG846> "Who<WG5101> are<WG1488> you?<WG4771>" knowing<WG1492> that<WG3754> it was<WG2076> the Lord.<WG2962>
Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> and<WG2532> took<WG2983> the bread,<WG740> <WG2532> gave<WG1325> it to them,<WG846> and<WG2532> the fish<WG3795> likewise.<WG3668>
This<WG5124> is now<WG2235> the third time<WG5154> that Jesus<WG2424> was revealed<WG5319> to his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> after he had risen<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>

So<WG3767> when<WG3753> they had eaten their breakfast,<WG709> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to Simon<WG4613> Peter,<WG4074> "Simon,<WG4613> son of Jonah,<WG2495> do you<WG25> love me<WG3165> more than<WG4119> these?<WG5130>" He said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Yes,<WG3483> Lord;<WG2962> you<WG4771> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> I have affection<WG5368> for you.<WG4571>" He said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Feed<WG1006> my<WG3450> lambs.<WG5130>"

He said<WG3004> to him<WG846> again<WG3825> a second time,<WG1208> "Simon,<WG4613> son of Jonah,<WG2495> do you<WG25> love me?<WG3165>" He said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Yes,<WG3483> Lord;<WG2962> you<WG4771> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> I have affection<WG5368> for you.<WG4571>" He said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Tend<WG4165> my<WG3450> sheep.<WG4263>"

He said<WG3004> to him<WG846> the third time,<WG5154> "Simon,<WG4613> son of Jonah,<WG2495> do you<WG5368> have affection for me?<WG3165>" Peter<WG4074> was grieved<WG3076> because<WG3754> he asked<WG2036> him<WG846> the third time,<WG5154> "Do you<WG5368> have affection for me?<WG3165>" He<WG2532> said<WG2036> to him,<WG846> "Lord,<WG2962> you<WG4771> know<WG1492> everything.<WG3956> You<WG4771> know<WG1097> that<WG3754> I have affection<WG5368> for you.<WG4571>" Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Feed<WG1006> my<WG3450> sheep.<WG4263>

Most<WG281> certainly<WG281> I tell<WG3004> you,<WG4671> when<WG3753> you were<WG2258> young,<WG3501> you dressed<WG2224> yourself,<WG4572> and<WG2532> walked where<WG3699> you wanted<WG2309> to.<WG1161> But when<WG3752> you are old,<WG1095> you will stretch out<WG1614> your<WG4675> hands,<WG5495> and<WG2532> another<WG243> will dress<WG2224> you,<WG4571> and<WG2532> carry<WG5342> you<WG4571> where<WG3699> you don't<WG3756> want to go.<WG2309>"

Now he<WG2036> said this,<WG5124> signifying<WG4591> by what<WG4169> kind of death<WG2288> he would glorify<WG1392> God.<WG2316> When<WG2532> he had said<WG2036> this,<WG5124> he said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "Follow<WG190> me.<WG3427>"

Then<WG1161> Peter,<WG4074> turning around,<WG1994> saw<WG991> a disciple<WG3101> following.<WG190> This was the disciple<WG3101> whom<WG3739> Jesus<WG2424> sincerely loved,<WG25> the one<WG1909> who<WG5101> had also<WG2532> leaned<WG377> on<WG1909> Jesus<WG2424>' breast<WG4738> at<WG1722> the supper<WG1173> and<WG2532> asked,<WG2036> "Lord,<WG2962> who<WG3588> is<WG2076> going to betray You?<WG4571>"
Peter<WG4074> seeing<WG1492> him,<WG5126> said<WG3004> to Jesus,<WG2424> "Lord,<WG2962> <WG1161> what<WG5101> about this man?<WG3778>"

Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him,<WG846> "If<WG1437> I desire that<WG2309> he<WG846> stay<WG3306> until<WG2193> I come,<WG2064> what<WG5101> is that to<WG4314> you?<WG4571> You<WG4771> follow<WG190> me.<WG3427>"

This<WG3778> saying<WG3056> therefore<WG3767> went<WG1831> out<WG1831> among<WG1519> the brothers,<WG80> that<WG3754> this<WG1565> disciple<WG3101> wouldn't<WG599> <WG3756> die.<WG599> Yet<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> didn't<WG3756> say<WG2036> <WG3754> to him<WG846> that he wouldn't<WG599> <WG3756> die,<WG599> but,<WG235> "If<WG1437> I desire that<WG2309> he<WG846> stay<WG3306> until<WG2193> I come,<WG2064> what<WG5101> is that to<WG4314> you?<WG4571>"

This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the disciple<WG3101> who<WG3588> testifies<WG3140> about<WG4012> these things,<WG5130> and<WG2532> wrote<WG1125> these things.<WG5023> We<WG2532> know<WG1492> that<WG3754> his<WG846> witness<WG3141> is<WG2076> true.<WG227>

There<WG1161> are<WG2076> also<WG2532> many<WG4183> other things<WG243> which<WG3745> Jesus<WG2424> did,<WG4160> which<WG3748> if<WG1437> they would all<WG2596> <WG1520> be written,<WG1125> I suppose that<WG3633> even the world<WG2889> itself<WG846> wouldn't<WG5562> <WG3761> have room<WG5562> for the books<WG975> that would be written.<WG1125>
